abstract: Jules Allen, photographer, captured the sweat-soaked denizens of Gleason's Gym.
snippet: Jules Allen, photographer, captured the sweat-soaked denizens of Gleason's Gym.
lead_paragraph: After moving to New York from California in 1978, Jules Allen went to the legendary Gleason's Gym to learn to box. But he stayed to make the sweat-soaked photographs that populate a just-published book, "Double Up." On Lens, David Gonzalez interviews Mr. Allen and presents a slide show. Check it out ringside on Lens »
